name: SourceKnowledge Shopping Ads
author: SourceKnowledge

sections.description:
Connect your WooCommerce store to the SourceKnowledge platform and we’ll help you get more sales from in-market shoppers.

In just a few clicks, you can install the SourceKnowledge App and turn your store catalog into shopping ads without any developer time. Once you connect your WooCommerce store to SourceKnowledge, your shopping ads are created from your catalog and run on comparison shopping sites, deal sites, and on our micro-influencer channel.

Shopping Ads

Increase brand recognition and reach new shoppers that are actively looking for your products on shopping comparison sites, deal sites and with influencers. Enter your business goals, either RoAS or CPA and your campaign will be optimized to achieve your business objective.

Retargeting Ads

Re-market to active shoppers that have shown interest in your products, but left your store without converting. Retargeting ads are instantly created using your store catalog and promote your top selling products. Ads are refreshed daily based on your bestsellers and current discounts or promotions. Simply enter your business goals, either ROAS or CPA and your campaign will be automatically optimized.

Personalized Customer Support

Enjoy personalized and committed customer support that is focused on driving sales. Reach us by email or phone.

No monthly fees

Set your budget and maximum CPC and we will optimize your bids across our shopping network. Minimum budget $1,000. Pause at any time.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/sourceknowledge-shopping-ads directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Plugins->Installed Plugins to navigate to the plugins list.
  4. Go to the Settings link under the plugin SourceKnowledge Shopping Ads.
  5. Click on the button Get Started.
  6. Sign-up for a SourceKnowledge Account or Sign-in with an existing SourceKnowledge account.
  7. Grant required WooCommerce permissions.
  8. Profit.
sections.faq:
Where can I get support or get some help in order to setup the plugin correctly?

If you get stuck, you can go to our Help Center.

If you can’t find an answer that suit you needs please email us to: support@sourceknowledge.com
or
call us to our toll free: (800) 887-6680.

Where can I report bugs or contribute to the project?

Report bugs to our support team support@sourceknowledge.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 Initial release

First release of the plugin.

1.0.1 Bugfix

Released a bugfix for websites that have www.domain.com, but registered domain is domain.com.
Installation security measures improved.

1.0.2 Bugfix

Released a bugfix to fix compatibility issues with WordPress 5.4.
Fixed installation status issue.

1.0.3 Bugfix

Fix a classname bug in 1.0.2

1.0.4 Bugfix

Fixing registration condition that failed in websites hosted behind proxies.

1.0.5 Bugfix

Fixing issue tracking new customers for guest checkouts.

1.0.6

Adding feature for sending version information, to improve customer support.

1.0.7

Fixing version compatibility in manifest.

1.0.8

Fixing issue with empty customer tracking information when user information is somehow incomplete.

upgrade_notice.1.0.0: First version of the plugin, no upgrade required.

upgrade_notice.1.0.2: Update the plugin to fix compatibility issues with Wordpress 5.4.
